strapiPost.title: Northwest Arkansas Ranked 4th Best Places To Buy A Home In 2023
strapiPost.content:
The Northwest Arkansas metro area was ranked the 4th best place to buy a home in 2023 by the National Association of Realtors.

  • Rapid growth: The population of Northwest Arkansas is growing at an annual rate of 2% compared to the national average of just .01%.
  • Better prices: The region ranked 2nd on the list regarding housing affordability with a median home price of $328,400 compared to the 2022 national median of $379,100.

Watch the KNWA news story HERE.
